name: Dungeons of Tal'Doria (itch)
description:
Dungeons of Tal'Doria is a coop sandbox exploration game mixing Diablo rpg skills, loot, and leveling within a Cube World like game; go exploring an infinite world of unique biomes, collecting and training pets you find, discovering dungeons, and looting treasure while augmenting your abilities and advancing as a Knight, Mage or Archer. Then return home for respite were you can craft items, go fishing, and learn professions that can help you and your fellow explorers.

Current Progress

We've implemented the main combat and exploration part. The demo version has a few limitations (3x3 biomes, only two biome variants, you can only level up to level 6, no skill system). If you enjoy this version you will soon be able to buy the early access version that has many more stuff implemented and let you play together with friends!

Support us!

Want to help support us during the development and enjoyed the demo? Consider buying us a coffee (5$) and getting access to an extended demo, which gives you another biome type and allows you to explore past level 6 content! (Up to level 11)

Controls

WASD - Movement
Mouse - Look around
Left Mouse Button - Auto Attack
Left Shift - Evade
F- Interact
